 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.sd.text.segment

Interface Summary
BooleanFeatureComputation Interface for computing a boolean feature for text.
CommonFeatures Catalogue of common features.
SplitFunction An interface for specifying the splitting of text for a SegmentSequence.
 

Class Summary
BaseDelimSplitFunction A split function that splits text based on delimiters.
FeatureBag Structure to hold boolean features with their associated computations.
HasAnyFeature A boolean feature computation that is a logic or of other feature computations.
HasDigitFeature A boolean feature computation to determine whether text has a digit.
HasParseFeature A boolean feature computation to find a parse in text.
HasPatternFeature A boolean feature computation to find a pattern in text.
MultiDelimSplitFunction A split function that splits text based on sequences of multiple consecutive delimiters.
PatternExtractorSplitFunction A pattern finder split function that extracts the first found pattern from the text.
PatternFinderSplitFunction An interface for specifying the splitting of text using a patternFinder.
Segment Container class for text 'segments' associated with boolean feature computations whose results for the text are cached in this class.
SegmentFactory Utility to generate a starting set of segments.
SegmentMachine Utility to traverse segment sequences.
SegmentSequence Container for an ordered sequence of segments.
SegmentUtils Segment utility methods.
SingleDelimSplitFunction A split function that splits text based on the presense of delimiters.
